body:
>Why does adding requestId prevent the loading add-on from stealing focus? 

The issue was that a `LoadingOverlay` without `requestIds` listens for _any_ requests being made to the remote API. When the ExtensionSelect was fed input, it made an API call for filtered extensions, and the LoadingOverlay would swap some DOM elements accordingly. Hence, the fix for this bug was to specify the requests the Overlay should be listening for.

>Would it make sense to make requestIds a required prop?

Probably, this was the _only_ `LoadingOverlay` that didn't have its `requestIds` defined.
